snippet.title: Official Trailer - Two Falls (Nish Takuakut)
snippet.description:
Two Falls (Nish Takuakut) is a narrative-driven game that let's you live the intertwining journeys of Jeanne, a shipwrecked girl stranded far from the French colonies, and Maïkan, a young Innu who witnesses in horror the way European settlers treat the land his ancestors.

Join our Patreon and help fund indigenous video game projects: www.patreon.com/unreliablenarratorsgames

Visit our website unreliablenarrators.games, and stay tuned for more news via our social media:
https://www.instagram.com/two.falls/
https://www.facebook.com/unreliablenarratorsgames
